thought: Slack API call in mainWorkflow is missing the required 'blocksUi' or 'messages' parameter, causing the error about missing 'messages'. The current slack_params only have 'select', 'channelId', and 'messageType', which is insufficient for 'block' messageType. I will update slack_params to include 'blocksUi' with the message text in Slack block format as done in action_2.
plan: Update slack_params in mainWorkflow to include 'blocksUi' parameter with a Slack block containing the message text
Set 'messageType' to 'block' to match the blocksUi usage
Test Slack sending again to verify fix
